## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`make test` with `-race`)
- [ ] Linter passes (`make lint`)
- [ ] I did not skip/disable tests to make CI green
- [ ] I added/updated tests for new functionality
- [ ] I updated docs if user-facing behavior changed
